name: v0.11.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow configuring API endpoints by @jradtilbrook in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/202


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/compare/v0.10.0...v0.11.0

name: v0.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow tests to run on PRs by @jradtilbrook in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/197

## Fixes
* Fix cluster support by @jradtilbrook in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/200


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0

name: v0.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add team data source by @margueritepd in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/190
* add support for tags by @mhornbacher in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/186
* Add allow rebuilds to pipeline resource by @jradtilbrook in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/193

## New Contributors
* @margueritepd made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/190

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

name: v0.8.0
body:
## Added
* Add cluster_id argument to pipeline resource by @kate-syberspace in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/181

## New Contributors
* @kate-syberspace made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/181

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

name: v0.7.0
body:
## Fixed

- Brought back build target for darwin/arm64 [#189] @mhornbacher 

## New Contributors

- @mhornbacher made their first contribution in #189 

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
## Added

- `buildkite_team_member` resource: Manage organisation team membership [#173]  @jradtilbrook 
- Bump Golang to 1.17.3
- Pipeline resource: Add `build_pull_request_labels_changed` property [#164] @hadusam 

## Fixed

- Fixed typo in pipeline docs [#172] @RussellRollins 
- Added `cancel_deleted_branch_builds` to pipeline docs [#160] @keith

## New Contributors
* @keith made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/160
* @RussellRollins made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/172
* @Bockit made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/165
* @hadusam made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/164

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
### Added

* Pipeline resource: Add badge_url property [[PR #151](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/151)] @JPScutt
* Pipeline resource: Add filter_condition and filter_enabled to provider_settings [[PR #157](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/157)] @gu-kevin

### Fixed

* Improved documentation for pipeline resource [[PR #145](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/145)] [[PR #146](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/146)] @jlisee
* Improved error when an unrecognised team slug is used in pipeline resource [[PR #155](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/155)] @yob
* Improved error message when an unrecognised ID is used while importing a pipeline schedule [[PR #144](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/144)] @yob

name: v0.4.0
body:
### Added

* `buildkite_meta` data source for fetching the IP addresses Buildkite uses for webhooks [[PR #136](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/136)] @yob

name: v0.3.0
body:
### Added

* `buildkite_pipeline` resource can now manage provider settings (which webhooks to build on, etc) [[PR #123](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/123)] @vgrigoruk

### Changed

* `buildkite_pipeline` resource: use 'Computed: true' for attributes that are initialized on backend [[PR #125](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/125)] @vgrigoruk
  * when these properties are unspecified in terraform, default values are left to Buildkite to define

name: v0.2.0
body:
### Added

* New `buildkite_pipeline` data source [[PR #106](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/106)] @yob

### Changed

* Add darwin/arm64 (M1 systems) to the build matrix [[PR #104](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/104)] @yob
* The following resources and data sources can now be used by API tokens that belong to non administrators, provided
  the token belongs to a user who has team maintainer permissions [[PR #112](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/112)] @chloeruka @yob
  * `buildkite_pipeline` resource
  * `buildkite_pipeline` data source
  * `buildkite_pipeline_schedule` resource
* All resources and data sources now have acceptance tests [many PRs] @chloeruka @yob

name: v0.1.0
body:
### Added

* New `pipeline_schedule` resource [[PR #87](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/87)] @vgrigoruk

### Changed

* Require terraform 0.13 or greater [[PR #89](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/89)] @vgrigoruk
* Add PowerPC 64 LE to the build matrix [[PR #92](https://github.com/buildkite/terraform-provider-buildkite/pull/92)] @runlevel5

name: v0.0.17
body: No code changes from 0.0.16 - just the first release signed by a buildkite gpg key that will be available in the terraform registry as `buildkite/buildkite`.

name: v0.0.16
body: This release contains no new code, it just tests releasing the provider from its new home in the Buildkite organisation.

name: v0.0.15
body:
Added missing documentation for pipeline parameters.

Thanks to @leungtimothy for the contribution

name: v0.0.14
body: Add documentation in the format required for Terraform Registry

name: v0.0.13
body: Update the release process to follow the Terraform Registry guides

name: v0.0.10
body:
This release adds the ability to specify team access when creating a pipeline.  
Thanks to @darrylb-github for contributing the functionality!

name: v0.0.9
body: This release adds the ability to specify team access when creating a pipeline.Thanks to @darrylb-github for contributing the functionality!

name: v0.0.8
body: This release adds more fields to the pipeline resource to support configuring the default branch and build skipping/cancellation.

name: v0.0.7
body: This release doesn't change any provider functionality, it simply fixes the release action used to attach binaries to GitHub releases

name: v0.0.6
body: There was a bug in the provider that caused updates to pipeline steps to be set as the default instead of the user provided steps. This is now fixed

name: v0.0.5
body: This release fixes the update pipeline action that was previously not working.

name: v0.0.4
body:
## Changelog

0623051 Remove unused graphql variable for updating pipeline
0b55c50 Use GoReleaser (#11)

name: Support pipeline steps
body:
This release brings support for configuring pipeline steps.
The current implementation expects the yaml steps to be stringified, this is because the Buildkite GraphQL API expects the same format.

We might consider using a more well-defined format in a future release

name: Support basic pipelines
body: This release adds support for Buildkite pipelines. It however, does not allow configuring the steps and instead sets the upload step.

name: Initial release supporting Buildkite agent tokens
body:
This is the first release of this Terraform plugin.

It currently only supports Buildkite agent tokens but more things will be added in the future.
